lines.text:
[referring to a porn film]
As for this, I've seen it. Twice. You had good lighting and a bad director.
What's the wildest thing you've ever done?
I hope I haven't done it yet.
What do you want to see on your honeymoon?
What are you trying to prove? That you're a man? Well, a man is judged by what's in his head, not in his bed.
I'll give you a geography lesson some time.

[looking her over]
I think I've just had one.
I like men. Maybe I hate them. I'm not always sure.
